definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: Our Tax programme provides an introduction to CGT on shares - we explain the basic principles of CGT calculations on the sale of shares by individuals.
sentences.chinese: 解釋資本增值稅的基本原則及售賣股份後的計算方法。

sentences.english: It is an interactive video installation about Consumption preference and new experience of a perspective upon the basic unit of videos.
sentences.chinese: 錄像自動售賣機是一件互動新媒體錄像裝置藝術作品。

sentences.english: Inspections of freshwater fish at local markets would be stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 會加強檢驗本地街市售賣的淡水魚。

sentences.english: Sometime visit a shop that sells professional chef knives and butchering blades.
sentences.chinese: 有次我參觀一家售賣專業廚刀和屠宰刀的工廠。

sentences.english: Main dishes is hainan chicken rice with sprouts.
sentences.chinese: 主要售賣海南芽菜雞飯。

sentences.english: We will reinforce the sales promotion member's selling enthusiasm , will make every effort to raise a product selling amounts.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: Vendors here sell handmade rugs, clothing and glittering embroidered slippers.
sentences.chinese: 商販們在售賣陶罐，服裝和亮光閃閃的繡花拖鞋。

sentences.english: We will enhance our sales persons' enthusiasm, making every effort to improve the sales amount.
sentences.chinese: 我們將加強促銷員的售賣積極性，力求提高產品銷量。

sentences.english: The difference is that it sells material works of art.
sentences.chinese: 不同之處在於這種展覽往往是售賣素材類作品。

sentences.english: Experts estimate that one out of every five fish sold was caught illegally.
sentences.chinese: 據專家估計，售賣的魚中有五分之一源於非法捕撈。

sentences.english: Some people are repackaging and selling my work for money.
sentences.chinese: 有些人爲了錢重新包裝我的工作，然後售賣。

sentences.english: Mr. Chan makes and sells matallic balls.
sentences.chinese: 陳生負責製造及售賣某某貨品。

sentences.english: Eventually, possession and sale of recreational drugs will be decriminalized.
sentences.chinese: 最後，藏有及售賣與康樂將毒品合法化。

sentences.english: A waitress serves butter beer at the Hogshead Pub.
sentences.chinese: 豬頭酒吧前，服務生在售賣黃油啤酒。

sentences.english: Grey-market perfumes and toiletries are now commonly sold by mail.
sentences.chinese: 水貨香水和化妝品現在常常通過郵購方式售賣。

sentences.english: This is the beautiful room service chicken fricassee.
sentences.chinese: 這是這個美麗的客房售賣的燉雞肉丁。

definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to offer (goods or services)/to open (for business etc)
